title: (Friday Full) Maren Morris on How She Handles Getting Emotional On Stage and Taking Her Son on the Road +  Lunchbox Called 911 Again and We Hear It + Easy Trivia!
itunes:title: (Friday Full) Maren Morris on How She Handles Getting Emotional On Stage and Taking Her Son on the Road +  Lunchbox Called 911 Again and We Hear It + Easy Trivia!
description:
Maren Morris stops by the studio to talk about playing her dream venues, how she still gets nervous and emotional about performing and updates on her son swimming and being on the tour bus with her. Who can bring home the win this week in Easy Trivia where the categories include Animals, Country Music and Kids Cereal!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
